page.title: 16A day in my life.
page.content: MY name is Sarah Chinn. I live in Tattingstone Village and go to Tattingstone School.A typical day for me starts at 8 o'clock when I get up. I go downstairs and have breakfast of marmite toast and cereal and a drink orange juice.I get washed and brush my teeth. Then I go back upstairs and get dressed and brush my hair.I play with Oliver,my dog,and then put his lead on and walk to school.I talk to my friends until Mr Riley comes out and tells us to line up.We go and hang our bags and coats up and then we have assembly. After assembly Mrs Williams takes out the 1st and 2nd years to do Indian topic work.Sometimes she takes the 3rd and 4th years for poetry workshop.If we stay with Mr Riley we do English until break at 10.30 and then Maths from 10.45 until dinner time at 12.00.
